articles.content:

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: PwC to become OpenAI's largest enterprise customer amid genAI boom - Reuters
articles.description: PwC will become the largest customer and first reseller of OpenAI's enterprise product as part of a new deal, the accounting giant said on Wednesday, as businesses rush to adopt and capitalize on generative artificial intelligence.
